snippet.title: Blooming Business: Casino - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
We're very happy to announce Blooming Business: Casino, our new tycoon game with an animal twist. "Design, build and run your own casino, where drama can arise among your charming animal employees, clients and VIPs. Decide your commercial strategy and manage spirited staff. Will you do what you must to ensure the house always wins?"

Wishlist the game now on Steam: https://bit.ly/3wAS1Ox
For the quickest updates, you can also follow us here:
• Discord - https://discord.gg/GHUWCJe6BT
• Twitter - https://twitter.com/BloomingBiz
• Newsletter - https://tinyurl.com/kjhfdy9m
